name: wp-excellent
description: WP starter based on workflow for Cube CSS, Every Layout, Design Tokens and Tailwind for uitility, based on the concepts explained in https://buildexcellentwebsit.es
author: Lene Saile

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently 'npm run browser-sync --config browser-sync.config.js' 'npm run css -- --watch' 'npm run js -- --watch'
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently 'npm run css -- --postcss --minify' 'npm run js -- --minify'
